About.name: University of Bradford
About.about:
This is where your journey begins.
At Bradford, our degrees are more than just a qualification. It's all about giving you the opportunities to become a confident, skilled and employable graduate. You'll get practical training and learn the skills you need to make your mark on the world.
We offer over 100 undergraduate courses across our four faculties. Whichever you choose, we'll be there to support you every step of the way. We'll make sure you reach your full potential, both academically and personally, so that when you graduate, you'll be ready to take on anything.
Here at Bradford, you get a real-world education. Our courses are designed using input from our industry partners, so you'll develop the skills employers need. You'll put theory into practice in the lad, in the field, and on placement. We ensure as many students as possible undertake placements and sandwich years, as well as having exposure to industry-standard facilities on campus.
About.whatMakesUsDifferent:
The University of Bradford is one of the most socially inclusive universities in the UK and celebrates both the differences and similarities in our many communities.
We welcome, support and dedicate ourselves to the success of our students whatever their background, identity, beliefs or challenges. We see individuals and their potential, and work hard to remove barriers to their success.
We provide tailored support to students coming from a range of backgrounds who are looking to enter Higher Education, and offer outstanding support, personally and academically, to ensure our students are able to succeed and progress in life beyond university.

Stats.heading: Stats
Stats.description: Statistics and reviews are supplied by trusted partners and are independent to UCAS. You should also consider attending an open day and talking to staff and students.

StudentLife.heading: Student life
studentLifeParagraphs: University isn’t all lectures and seminars. Here at Bradford, we have everything you need for an exciting and well-rounded university experience that’s unique to your interests and ambitions.
Our city campus is a close-knit community that’s full of opportunities for you to meet new people, learn new skills and get involved in loads of activities.
Our Students’ Union has over 60 societies for you to join, they are a great way to make friends and explore your passions, you might even discover something completely new.

Discover the city of Bradford, which is home to beautiful historical architecture, gorgeous green spaces, and a welcoming, vibrant and diverse community, all within a close proximity to the University campus. There are even more gems to discover beyond the city centre.

regionGuides.heading: What's it like to live in Yorkshire and The Humber?Check out our region guide
paragraphs: Yorkshire and the Humber has history and innovation in abundance. Famed for beautiful countryside, the region inspired a wealth of literary heritage, with links to Tolkien, Plath, Larkin, Brontë and beyond. Major cities – including Bradford, Hull, Leeds, Sheffield and York – boast a range of cultural accolades among them, including two recent UK City of Culture nods. Great nightlife, supportive communities and excellent transport routes make it the perfect hub for studying – no matter your interests or ambitions.

regionGuides.heading: What's it like to live in Bradford?Check out our city guide
paragraphs: Considering Bradford for your studies? Discover a culturally rich city known for its diverse community, strong university links, and world-class food.

campusParagraphs: Bradford is a campus-based university, and you’ll love the friendly and inclusive community spirit here.

There's always something happening on campus, and you’ll have so many opportunities to explore new interests, learn new skills, and meet new people. Our campus is compact, self-contained, and located just minutes from the city centre.
We have a range of facilities on campus. Student Central is the home of the University of Bradford Union of Students (UBU) and a range of student support services.
As a student, you’ll have access to a 24/7 library and a multi-faith prayer room.
The University is also home to Unique Fitness, which includes a refurbished gym, a 25-metre swimming pool, a climbing wall and a range of courts and pitches available for hire.

Courses.heading: Courses
paragraphs: We offer over 100 undergraduate courses across four academic faculties. Courses are designed using input from industry partners and our students put theory into practice in the lab, in the field, and on placement. We ensure as many students as possible undertake placements and sandwich years, as well as having exposure to industry-standard facilities on campus. We also offer plenty of opportunities to study abroad.
We also offer over 200 postgraduate study options, including full-time and part-time courses, and distance learning options.

Apprenticeships.heading: Apprenticeships
paragraphs: University of Bradford degree apprenticeships are designed with employers to meet the needs of industry and can be taught in blocks or as flexible learning.
We also offer distance learning with some of our programmes, allowing greater flexibility for study.

International.heading: International
paragraphs: With 50 years of academic excellence behind us as a University, we have continued to grow our international reputation and course provision.
We have always been pioneers in developing new course subjects, reflecting and anticipating the needs of employers, our students, and of society as a whole.
At the University of Bradford, a degree is more than a qualification.
Student life at Bradford is an adventure to be shared with new friends, on campus, in the city, or even studying abroad.
Your student journey at Bradford will see you become part of a global village within one of the friendliest, most diverse and multicultural campus communities in the UK.

You’ll mix and make friends with people from a huge variety of social, educational and cultural backgrounds. You’ll spread your intellectual wings, broaden your social horizons and engage in discussions which might change your views, or reinforce them.
It’s an enriching experience that will also serve you well in the modern job market.
lists: We will help you enter the world of work fluent in a multitude of cultures, technology-savvy and primed to make a contribution in your chosen profession.
As one of our students, you won’t just graduate – you’ll grow, develop and flourish and learn how to be a global citizen.
Our courses are sculpted with industry input from many of the employers who will be sifting through your CV.
You’ll be taught by the academic experts whose pioneering research is shaping the very future of those industries.
Put your theory into practice in our world-class facilities and then on a work placement with some of the world’s biggest names.
